title: Pixel 3xl not charging with OEM charger plus OEM headphone also not working
content:
OEM charger not working but other usb a to usb c works. I don't know what is wrong.
This has happened a couple of times now, I tried cleaning the charging port with isopropyl alcohol and it will start charging again with three OEM charger and then after 2 days or so and it won't charge again and so I clean it again with isopropyl alcohol and it stays working again... But I'm just tired of cleaning it.
What the heck is wrong!
The OEM charger is fine, I tried with other phone and it works well.
